thread.title: RELX reiterates outlook after strong Risk unit growth
thread.title_full: RELX reiterates outlook after strong Risk unit growth

title: RELX reiterates outlook after strong Risk unit growth
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Thu, Oct 22, 2015, 07:15 BST - UK Markets open in 45 mins. RELX reiterates outlook after strong Risk unit growth Reuters - UK Focus – 2 minutes 13 seconds ago 16.14 0.00 
LONDON, Oct (HKSE: 3366-OL.HK - news ) 22 (Reuters) - RELX (Stuttgart: RDEB.SG - news ) , Europe's largest media group formerly known as Reed Elsevier (Other OTC: RUKEF - news ) , reiterated its full-year outlook after reporting an as-expected 3 percent growth in underlying revenue in the first nine months of the year. 
RELX (LSE: REL.L - news ) , which provides information for scientists, lawyers, doctors and the business community, said it had seen a continued strong performance from its Risk & Business Information unit, with underlying revenue growth there up 7 percent. 
The group said as a result its full-year outlook was unchanged, with RELX expecting another year of underlying revenue, profit and earnings growth. (Reporting by Kate Holton; editing by Sarah Young) Tax cuts, pensions, childcare, online accounts and beer duty, here's … Related Stock Articles Follow the quotes you care about most.
